column2: Office Properties Income Trust owns, operates and leases office buildings to single tenants and multi-tenant buildings. The company is headquartered in Newton, Massachusetts and currently employs 0 full-time employees. The firm operates through direct ownership of real estate properties segment that are primarily leased to government tenants. The firm's properties are located in areas, including Alabama, Arizona, California, Colorado, District of Columbia, Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, New Hampshire, New Jersey and New Mexico.
